name: getApiConfig
comments:
Given an apiIdent (Required), this function returns the base Url and authentication headers for the requested apiIdent.  This function is used from the following when connecting to other APIs:
1.  From the cfg_obj and cfg_obj_field rules to validate objects and fields 
2.  From the sync Resource to call the findCatalyst function
3.  From the Process Reaction Rule to post reactions to APIs
